Name: dpsingh
AboutMe:
Working for social causes is what drives me and complexities of emotions is what I try to solve. Clear, concise and latest is what drives me and my fuel is soulful 80's Bollywood tracks.

A sucker for new technologies, complex problems and fast solutions, this is what has defined me since last 5 years. Post my BCA, I invested heavily in my transformation to garner skills on the latest languages, platforms and skills relevant in today's multi-screen, big data and 1 touch wizardry of mobile applications.

Primarily, playing with a Gem called "Android", I have done mobile apps, built API's and web apps as well.

Working along side my post-graduation, I learnt via interning with 3 wonderful startups where I have been involved in a host of activities ranging from

--> Architecture Ideation --> Client-Side Interaction --> Team Nurturing --> End-to-end service development and deployment --> Mobile as well as Web applications

A few accolades and inspiring moments have been:

--> Core Developer for "WISH" Android Application for Women, now part of Delhi Government's "Himmat" initiative.

--> Have been accoladed by Ministry of Home Affairs, Indian Government for "Wish" project and is in the process of implementing/creating localized variants of the same for all 29 states of India.

--> Winner at "Safety of Women Security in Delhi", a national-level competition at Indian Institute of Foreign Trade, Jan-2015

--> Winner of GSF hack challenge organized by GSF and mentored by PayTM, Jan-2014.

--> Best Business App Challenge award in Space App Challenge organized by NASA in IIT Delhi, May-2013.

--> Gold medalist in Bachelor of Computer Application, Jun-2011.
